page.title: 20Education in Rhos
page.content: People in the Rhos area start school at the age of five.They start at primary school.There are six main primary schools in the Rhos area,they are:Ponciauschool,Wern school,Rhos C.P.school and Ysgol Hooson(which is a welsh school). At the age of eleven pupils begin their secondry education.Pupils have a choice o between Grango school,Ruabon school, or Morgan Llwyd school(another welsh school). At the age of sixteen,pupils at Grango have a choice of sixth form education at Ruabon school,or to go to Technical College in Wrexham. The newest school in the area is Ysgol y Grango,which was officially opened in 1985.
